post.summary: Lists all active users in a Slack workspace.
post.description: The listActiveUsers function retrieves a list of all active users in a Slack workspace, excluding any deactivated users. It provides detailed information about each user, including their profile data, team information, and various status indicators.

ai.systemPrompt: This function retrieves all active users in the workspace. It can be used to find user IDs if you know the user's name. You can filter by bots and paginate through results. The default limit is 100 users per page.

body.description: Body of the listActiveUsers sls call

cursor.description: A cursor to the next page of results.

limit.description: The maximum number of users to return.

200.description: Successful response containing an array of active user objects

id.description: Unique identifier for the workspace user

team_id.description: The ID of the team the user belongs to

deleted.description: Indicates if the user has been deactivated (always false for this method)

color.description: Used in some clients to display a special username color

real_name.description: The user's first and last name

tz.description: A human-readable string for the geographic timezone-related region

tz_label.description: Describes the commonly used name of the tz timezone

tz_offset.description: Number of seconds to offset UTC time by for this user's tz

profile.description: The profile object contains the default fields of a user's workspace profile

is_admin.description: Indicates whether the user is an Admin of the current workspace

is_owner.description: Indicates whether the user is an Owner of the current workspace

is_primary_owner.description: Indicates whether the user is the Primary Owner of the current workspace

is_restricted.description: Indicates whether or not the user is a guest user

is_ultra_restricted.description: Indicates whether or not the user is a single-channel guest

is_bot.description: Indicates whether the user is a bot user

is_app_user.description: Indicates whether the user is an authorized user of the calling app

updated.description: A Unix timestamp indicating when the user object was last updated

is_email_confirmed.description: Indicates if the user's email address has been confirmed

who_can_share_contact_card.description: Who can share the user's contact card

enterprise_user.description: An object containing info related to an Enterprise Grid user

error.description: Error message describing the bad request
Error message describing the server error
